group_1.textRight: Wonder why I was invited...@I said I won't join for Witch hunting...

group_1.textLeft: Hm, it's because we're colleagues from the@same area.

group_1.textRight: No, I'm still Nanami-senpai's teammate after all.
I get angry whenever I'm with Kanagi of the East.

group_1.textLeft: That is not right, Anna.
If you're by yourself all the time, I can't keep an eye@on other colleagues.
Even if you are Nanami's teammate, you can work@safely in the east.
Is my idea not bad?

group_1.textRight: It's not a good idea.@You're being too nosy.

group_1.textLeft: Am I, meddling...?@[chara:101650:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101650:motion_300][chara:101650:cheek_0][chara:101650:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:101650:lipSynch_1]Hmm...my apologies...

group_1.textRight: If that's all you have to say, then I'm going home.

group_1.textLeft: No, wait Anna.

group_1.textRight: What is it now...?

group_1.textLeft: This is the boat I'm on; today I want you to@get along with me.
Recently, I heard there are fewer Witches@in the west.
It would be a good opportunity to purify your@Soul Gem.

group_1.textRight: Well... I guess that's true...

[chara:303750:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]*Gasp*!@[chara:303750:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303750:cheek_0][chara:303750:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:303750:lipSynch_1]That's being nosy again!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101650:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Is that so...

group_1.textRight: Just this one time!

group_1.textLeft: Anna!
I'm happy you said that, hm.
Then would you like to stop by home before going?

group_1.textRight: For what reason?
I told you I'll go, then you say something strange@like that...
If I go home, Kanagi won't be socializing with me@anymore, right?

group_1.textLeft: That's a problem.

group_1.textRight: What are you trying to say...?

group_1.textLeft: You see, the truth is...
From the moment Anna got here, I've been thinking.
Those winter clothes, they seem to be rather light@to me.
I thought it would be good if you got a jacket.

group_1.textRight: Again, you're being nosy.
I always wear these clothes.

I'm full of energy and don't have a colâ€”@[chara:303750:lipSynch_0][wait:0.5][bgEffect:shakeSmall][chara:303750:motion_400][chara:303750:cheek_1][chara:303750:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:303750:lipSynch_1][chara:303750:eyeClose_1]Achoo!
Ugh...
As soon as I say that, I have bad timing.

group_1.textLeft: Fake courage is never good.
Hm, that's not good, let me lend you my gloves.

group_1.textRight: [chara:303750:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Geeze, it's fine!
It's from a while ago!@You're so nosy!
When I'm with Kanagi, I look like I'm with@my mother!
I can barely breath!@I'm...going home!

group_1.textLeft: That was bad, Anna!@You can fix your mood with this!
Surely you like owls?

group_1.textRight: [chara:303750:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Owls?!

group_1.textLeft: Hm, please take this.

group_1.textRight: ...[chara:303750:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303750:motion_300][chara:303750:lipSynch_1]Don't need it.

group_1.textLeft: Why is that?

group_1.textRight: An owl mask would make me look like@a pro wrestler doll.
[chara:303750:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]I don't need it!

group_1.textLeft: Anna!

group_1.textCenter: Kanagi is always taking care of me too much!
Stubbornly pretending to know my feelings, but she@won't bend my opinion.
Even what I'm feeling now, she couldn't know...
(But, she was thinking and worrying about me...)

group_1.textRight: Um, I'm sorry, Kanagi.
I was being selfish and got heated up...

group_1.textLeft: Anna...

group_1.textRight: I'm at the rebellious age, so please don't worry@about it.
Rather, thank you for inviting me to hunt Witches.

group_1.textLeft: If that's it, then that's good...
Then tomorrow I'll come meet you, so be prepared.

group_1.textRight: Sure...
[chara:303750:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into](It's good that I apologized...)
